subject: Modern Luxury, Designed to Last - Sylvania Duplex Project
preview: Step inside this three-storey duplex in Sylvania - a home that redefines modern luxury. From the Enzo Sand limestone-look porcelain flowing seamlessly from indoors to outdoors, to the breathtaking Taj

full_threads.body:
Step inside this three-storey duplex in Sylvania - a home that redefines modern luxury. From the Enzo Sand limestone-look porcelain flowing seamlessly from indoors to outdoors, to the breathtaking Taj Mahal stone featured in the kitchen and bathrooms, every surface has been carefully considered.

Highlights include:

  • Cohesive palette carried across three levels

  • Family bathroom in Tufa Travertine for scale and impact

  • Ensuite pairing Avoca Bianco with Taj Mahal porcelain - the look of stone without the maintenance.

Mosman White splashback and outdoor Taj Mahal stone benchtop for a refined entertaining space

This project is a testament to how natural stone and porcelain can work together to create a timeless, cohesive home.
